oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Baier, John, 1902
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of John Baier, dated October 7th, 1901. Subscribed to by Wm. R. Fisher and Louis Vaupel as attesting witnesses. Illustrates the first page of the document. Baier’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on May 5th, 1902. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Baier family
